Sugianto Sabran Pernah Laporkan Bambang Widjojanto ke Bareskrim
04 Nov 2019, 02:18 by Tempo.co, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kepala Pusat Penerangan Kementerian Dalam Negeri Bahtiar mengatakan Kementerian sudah turun tangan menyelesaikan persoalan Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah Sugianto Sabran dalam insiden pelemparan botol di acara pertandingan sepak bola.
“Sudah langsung diselesaikan. Kemendagri selalu sigap, cepat mengambil upaya penyelesaian apapun terkait stabilitas dalam negeri,” kata Bahtiar dalam pesan singkat kepada Tempo, Ahad, 3 November 2019.
Sugianto melempar botol saat menyaksikan laga Kalteng Putra vs Persib Bandung, pada Jumat, 1 November 2019. Insiden ini viral di media sosial. Kemudian dia menjadi bulan-bulanan netizen.
Insiden yang terjadi dalam laga yang dimenangi Persib 2-0 itu terekam video. Pada video itu terlihat ulah Sugianto berada di tribun VVIP Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Jalan Tjilik Riwut, Palangka Raya. Mengenakan kaus warna oranye dan topi warna hitam, ia terlihat melempar botol air mineral ke arah lapangan.
Sugianto juga terlihat marah-marah sambil menunjuk-nunjuk sebelum turun dari tribun VVIP ke pinggir lapangan. Ia menghampiri Kapolres Palangka Raya AKBP Timbul Siregar dan memarahinya.
Sugianto adalah politikus Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan yang pernah melaporkan mantan komisioner KPK Bambang Widjojanto ke Badan Reserse dan Kriminal Polri pada 2015. Dia melaporkan Bambang ke Bareskrim dengan tuduhan menyuruh sejumlah orang memberikan keterangan palsu di persidangan Mahkamah Konstitusi.
Atas laporan tersebut, Bambang ditangkap Bareskrim dan sempat ditetapkan sebagai tersangka. Kasus itu, juga kasus yang menimpa Abraham Samad yang menjadi tersangka di kasus lainnya, membetot perhatian publik. Kepolisian akhirnya menghentikan kasus melalui deponering.
Sugianto menampik laporan kepada Bambang terkait dengan kasus hukum yang menjerat Komisaris Budi Gunawan (saat itu menjabat Kalemdikpol Polri) di KPK. Pascapenetapan tersangka Budi Gunawan, KPK mendapat gempuran dari DPR, PDIP, dan pemerintah. "Tidak ada kaitan dengan Budi Gunawan," kata Sugianto. "Saya hanya mencari kebenaran."
Sugianto juga menyanggah soal adanya arahan dari Ketua Umum PDIP Megawati Soekarnoputri ihwal pelaporan Bambang ke Bareskrim. Menurut Sugianto, dirinya yang berinisiatif. "Ini murni penegakkan hukum. Saya melapor sendiri," kata Sugianto.

Sugianto Sabran Reported Bambang Widjojanto to Criminal Investigation
Nov. 04 2019, 02:18 by Tempo.co, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Head of the Ministry of Home Affairs Information Center Bahtiar said the Ministry had intervened to resolve the issue of Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran in a bottle throwing incident at a soccer match.
"It was resolved immediately. The Ministry of Home Affairs has always been swift, quick to take any resolution efforts related to domestic stability, "Bahtiar said in a short message to Tempo, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
Sugianto threw a bottle while watching the Kalteng Putra vs Persib Bandung match, on Friday, November 1, 2019. This incident was viral on social media. Then he became a netizen.
The incident that occurred in the match won by Persib 2-0 was captured on video. In the video, Sugianto is seen in the VVIP stands of Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Jalan Tjilik Riwut, Palangka Raya. Wearing an orange shirt and black hat, he was seen throwing bottles of mineral water toward the field.
Sugianto also looked angry while pointing before descending from the VVIP stands to the edge of the field. He approached the Police Chief of Palangkaraya AKBP Timbul Siregar and scolded him.
Sugianto is a politician from the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle who reported former KPK commissioner Bambang Widjojanto to the Indonesian Police's Criminal Investigation and Detection Agency in 2015. He reported Bambang to Criminal Investigation on charges of having a number of people give false statements at the Constitutional Court trial.
Upon the report, Bambang was arrested by Bareskrim and was named a suspect. That case, also the case that befell Abraham Samad who was a suspect in another case, caught public attention. The police finally stopped the case through deponering.
Sugianto dismissed a report to Bambang related to a legal case that ensnared Commissioner Budi Gunawan (at that time he was the National Police Chief of Police) at the KPK. After determining the suspect Budi Gunawan, the KPK got an onslaught from the DPR, PDIP, and the government. "There is no connection with Budi Gunawan," said Sugianto. "I'm only looking for the truth."
Sugianto also denied the existence of directives from PDIP Chairperson Megawati Sukarnoputri regarding Bambang's reporting to Criminal Investigation. According to Sugianto, he took the initiative. "This is purely law enforcement. I report it myself," said Sugianto.
